pages.text: $(li)The Maple Witch Hut is a structure that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/maple_forest)Maple Forests$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Here, $(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) save multiple ingredients for their potions.$(br)$(li)Be careful, they will not be happy to see you walking arounding their home.
